article.title: AFCEA SOLUTIONS: Are You Who We Think You Are?
article.author: H. Mosher
article.abstract: The questions around Identity Assurance seem to boil down to: "Are you who we think you are?" and "Are we who you think we are?" These questions are critically important to warfighters, as Richard Hale, Chief Information Assurance Executive, Defense Information Systems Agency explained this morning in this morning's opening keynote. Read on for information on how to tune in to the rest of the Identity Assurance conference from AFCEA SOLUTIONS.
article.text:
The Identity Assurance event from AFCEA SOLUTIONS is being covered by Associate Publisher and Chief Knowledge Officer Beverly Mowery and New Media Editor Helen Thompson on Twitter during the next couple of days. Readers can follow the Twitter stream at www.twitter.com/signalmag. There is also an audio webcast, live, of the plenary sessions available here.
The questions around Identity Assurance seem to boil down to: "Are you who we think you are?" and "Are we who you think we are?" These questions are critically important to warfighters, as Richard Hale, Chief Information Assurance Executive, Defense Information Systems Agency explained in this morning's opening keynote.
The next plenary session broadcast takes place at 1 p.m. today, June 26. See the webcast link above to tune in, and we welcome your comments here.
